sentences.en: All of this may be fine if the relationship stays in cyberspace.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都不是问题,如果这个关系只局限于网络空间.

sentences.en: Effective online marketers do not merely transfer hard - copy ads to cyberspace.
sentences.cn: 讲求实效的网络营销者们绝不是简单地把平面广告抄送到网页上.

sentences.en: Gray pages, low - rate graphics -- this is vintage cyberspace.
sentences.cn: 灰色的页面, 低质量的图片 -- 这就是老式的网络.

sentences.en: In the intersubjectivity view, cyberspace is field of dissimilar being - with - others.
sentences.cn: 从主体间性的视角来看, 网络空间又是不同的主体“与他人共在”(Being -with-others )的场域,主体之间在网络空间的双向交互性促成了网络共同体的形成.

sentences.en: It's easy to create a phony identity in cyberspace.
sentences.cn: 在信息网络世界很容易制作假身份.

sentences.en: Laurie Anderson is giving new meaning to the developing language of cyberspace.
sentences.cn: 罗莉安德森给了网络语言的发展下了新定义.

sentences.en: On the one hand there are the proliferating net neo - logisms - e - mail, emoticons, cyberspace and so on.
sentences.cn: 一方面, 网络新词正在激增:比如电子邮件(e -mail ) 、 情感符(emoticon)和网络空间(cyberspace)等.

sentences.en: Or have you, out there in cyberspace, got a copy?
sentences.cn: 或许,你已经在你的电脑里硬盘面保留了一份拷贝,是 吗 ?

sentences.en: Possibilities abound out there in cyberspace just waiting for you.
sentences.cn: 盛产有可能出在电脑刚刚等着你.

sentences.en: She travels in cyberspace by sending messages to friends around the world.
sentences.cn: 她利用电子空间给世界各地的朋友们发送信件.

sentences.en: Students are discovering the endless amount of information in cyberspace.
sentences.cn: 学生在网络空间里不断发现无穷尽的信息。

sentences.en: The new idea of cyberspace and virtual reality are changing our existent.
sentences.cn: 赛博空间和虚拟实在(virtualreality )的新观念及它们所导致的技术力量正在加速改变人类的存在状态.

sentences.en: The territorial jurisdiction of cyberspace tort disputes have caused many debates.
sentences.cn: 网络侵权纠纷案件的地域管辖问题在理论界和实务界争议颇多.

sentences.en: These elements only exist in the cyberspace of a working computer program.
sentences.cn: 这些元素只存在于正在运行的电脑程序的网络空间里.

sentences.en: Various different kinds of goods for voting or cyberspace decorating, etc.
sentences.cn: 物品种类繁多,有给作品投票的、有装饰自己空间的等等.

sentences.en: Wanna surf the net? Cruise the information superhighway? Fly through cyberspace?
sentences.cn: 想要搜索网络? 超级高速导航信息? 通过计算机网络飞行?

trans.tran_en: all the connections between computers in different places, considered as a real place where information, messages, pictures etc exist
